snippet.title: 龍が如く │ Ryū ga Gotoku HD Edition 【PS3】 #01 │ Chapter 1 │ JP ver.
snippet.description:
☢ No Commentary Walkthrough / Playthrough in 1080p 60fps ☢ 
☣ This video may contain SPOILER! Watch at your own discretion! ☣ 

█► Playlist (Youtube) : http://bit.ly/2pEFSYB
█► Playlist (Dailymotion) : http://bit.ly/2oTTJv3
█► Yakuza [ENG] Playlist (Youtube) : http://bit.ly/2pk3gYW
█► Yakuza [ENG] Playlist (Dailymotion) : http://bit.ly/2p4faJN

➮ SUBSCRIBE my YOUTUBE channel for more videos : http://goo.gl/8BHg5g
➮ Videos backup on DAILYMOTION : http://www.dailymotion.com/ayaanny2311

○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○

龍が如く / Ryū ga Gotoku 1&2 HD edition (Like a Dragon) / Yakuza 1&2 HD edition
🎮 Platform(s) : PlayStation 3
► Genre(s) : Action-adventure
► Release date : PS3/JP: November 1, 2012 ║ WiiU/JP: August 8, 2013

This "HD edition" features both game remasters bundled in a single Blu-ray disc and later as a downloadable title on the Japanese PlayStation Store. These HD versions were released only in Japan.

○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○○

🎮 Difficulty Mode : Easy (Played the English ver. on Normal)
🎮 System Use / Played on : PS3
🎮 Version/Region: Japan (only)
💻 RECORDING SOFTWARE/HARDWARE : Elgato Game Capture HD60 Pro
► Do not re-upload the exact same videos and claim it's yours!
♪ Intro & Outro Song : Yakuza OST - funk goes on

········································­·······························
